title: Understanding Command Buttons
text: A command button is a control element that allows users to initiate an action or command. Think about what actions might be controlled by a button in a data entry form.

title: Purpose of Command Buttons
text: Consider how command buttons are used in forms. They often help users navigate through the form or execute specific tasks. What might be a common task in a data entry form?

hintAnswer: gives user control over the execution of each step of the process when entering data into the form
title: Functionality of Command Buttons
text: What is the primary function of a command button in a data entry form?
choices: gives user control over the execution of each step of the process when entering data into the form
impacts information in a user interface
